Texts.Chs: 这些生物体内似乎嵌入了某种奇怪的螺旋能量，或者就以^yellow;螺旋能量^reset;为简称。我已经把它塑造成一种你可以用来制作的更加包容的可用形式。现在去找一处熔炉去冶炼螺旋能量，然后去铁砧处锻造你的小钻风。
Texts.Eng: There seems to be some strange spiraling energy embedded withing these creatures, or ^yellow;Spiral Energy^reset; for short. I've molded it into a more contained form that you can use for crafting. You can now craft Spiral Power in the Furnace and the Spira Drill in your Anvil.
